grahampaige.comment:
It appears we all agree with this motion so far tonight based upon previous discussions at work sessions where there was consensus reached among School Board members regarding these policies after careful review by staff and input from stakeholders including teachers administrators parents students community leaders and other interested parties who were invited through public notices posted online social media email newsletters newspaper articles flyers posters radio announcements television appearances letters home etcetera
I appreciate everyone taking time out their busy schedules over several months now to participate in those meetings because they truly helped us better grasp what each division needs moving forward into next year especially considering ongoing challenges presented due to COVID19 pandemic which has affected every aspect about how operate daily business here locally nationally globally everywhere really 
So thank you again everybody involved whether virtually attending live streaming watching recorded versions reading minutes summaries news stories sharing thoughts electronically speaking directly during citizen comment periods sending emails calling leaving voicemails texting messaging tweeting posting replying liking commenting tagging retweeting forwarding copying pasting et cetera  
Now its officially time to make decisions since everything else already discussed thoroughly enough previously agreed upon unanimously without any opposition expressed openly throughout entire process up until present moment when Im casting last needed approval required procedurally per Robert Rules Order newly revised edition being followed closely according to parliamentary procedures adopted formally approved earlier today prior todays meeting convened started called order then adjourned briefly recessed reconvened resumed continued conducted concluded closed finally ended officially terminated completely finished totally done fully accomplished successfully completed satisfactorily wrappedup broughttoanend ceased stopped halted discontinued desisted suspended brokenoff severed disconnected separated detached unglued unhitched uncoupled released freed liberated cleared dismissed excused relieved spared exempt pardoned forgiven justified vindicated defended supported backed sustained upheld maintained protected preserved kept reserved retained held saved stored secured sheltered shielded guarded watched lookedafter minded tended caredfor attended served waitedon cateredtowaitedupon obeyedservedwaitedobeyed
